format.description: Specifies the format name of the specific content or rendition.

page.description: Specifies the page number of the specific content or rendition.

modifier.description: Specifies the page modifier of the specific rendition.

primary.description: Specifies whether the imported content is primary content or a rendition.

content-length.description: The byte count of the content uploaded.

content-charset.description: The charset of the content uploaded.

overwrite.description: Specifies whether or not to overwrite the existing content with the same content properties. * 'true', would overwrite the existing primary content. * 'false', throw an exception when the primary content or rendition with the same content properties already exists.

require-checksum.description: Specifies the query parameter for Checksum
